history.content: I'm staying just one or two nights in Amsterdam and want a no-frills hotel that's reliable and not overpriced. Any suggestions?

Based on your criteria of wanting a no-frills hotel that is reliable and not overpriced, I would recommend checking out **The Modern Hideaway**. It offers a great location, reliable amenities including room service, a terrace, and a hot tub, which should meet your needs comfortably. The interior reviews mention that the staff went above and beyond to assist guests, indicating reliability.
Do you think the **Modern Hideaway** also has free Wi-Fi? That’s important for my internet connection while I’m exploring Amsterdam.
Yes, according to the reviews, **The Modern Hideaway** does offer free Wi-Fi, so it should work well for your internet needs while exploring Amsterdam.
Could you tell me more about the breakfast options at **The Modern Hideaway**? I don’t want to miss out on any delicious meals during my visit.

Unfortunately, based solely on the available information, there isn't much detailed feedback about breakfast options at **The Modern Hideaway**. However, the reviews indicate that the breakfast options were okay, not too many choices, and that the Wi-Fi worked fine most of the time. So, while it might not be the most exciting dining experience, it should still provide adequate nutrition throughout your stay.
Thank you, that was very helpful. That's all I needed, goodbye.
